reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's sparkle and find it well-made, particularly suitable for special occasions like mother of the groom events.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: This gown is very pretty,feels well made. The fit is good true to size, I’m trying to decide on a mother of the bride dress for my daughters wedding in April and as of right now this one is winning. Read more
items.author: Kelda Kuhn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful for any occasion
items.body: Fits perfectly and is well made. After my son’s wedding I had it shortened to cocktail length and it is stunning like that. Read more
items.author: Bookish

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Itchy sequins but gorgeous dress
items.body: It was gorgeous and true to size but the sequins rubbed very hard against my arms and I had to send it back. It was too bad too since the color was so lovely but uncomfortable to wear! Read more
items.author: Kelly C. Clark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress - style is just not flattering on me
items.body: Very nice quality dress by Adrianna Papell - style just did not suit me. Sized as expected per the sizing chart. Lovely color. It is very long and would be beautiful on a taller person, I just don’t have the height to carry it off with my top heavy figure. Read more
items.author: SLB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Adrianna Pappel always makes a stunning dress, and this dress IS stunning. I chose the gunmetal colored dress in size 8, and as usual it fits very true to size. I'm 5'4" and 155lbs, and wear a size 8 in regular clothes. I'm wearing a corset and shapewear to hide my tummy, and as form fitting as this dress is, you couldn't tell what I was attempting to hide under it. It is VERY long (I'm in 5" heels) but I never tripped over the length, nor did anyone stand on the train, remarkably! The entire night I received a TON of compliments. I've pictured another dress by Adrianna Pappel (blue) in a side by side of this dress for comparison. Between the two, I'm thrilled I went with this one! As usual with this designer, the beading is quite detailed and sparkly, which makes the dress heavier than most. I happen to LOVE the weight of her dresses and wear it more like armor than something dainty. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: HopPinAndGo

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, but painful dress
items.body: This is a beautiful dress but the sequins rubbed against my arm and were very painful. I only wore the dress to try it on for a couple of minutes, but that was enough time to really do a number on my arm from my elbow to where the sleeve ended. Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable party option.
items.body: I wore this as a mother-of-the- bride and got so many compliments. I also machine washed this gown inside-out on delicate and it held up beautifully. The dress is structurally sound, high quality and looks beautiful in any season. It is worth every penny and then some. The back of the dress does dip lower than expected so plan your undergarments ahead of time. Read more
items.author: cari wobser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I just love this dress!! Fit’s very nicely and so pretty! Size: The overall size is right on, a bit long but will have seamstress hem to desired length. I am 5.5 3/4 tall. Comfort: This dress is not at all uncomfortable, inside is lined and soft. Color: Bright and shiny sequins of gold Read more
items.author: Anthony Barnhill

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nile, Navy, Blush, Deep Blue, Cabernet, Champagne/Gold, Lead, Black, Rosegold. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
